sample_reviews.title: Great Update!
sample_reviews.snippet: Love the new UI, though I only have printer so would be good to default to printer actions page

sample_reviews.title: Lifetime problems
sample_reviews.snippet: HP has got to be the worst printer I’ve ever purchased. Not for printing just for problems. It says Wi-Fi connection error every month two weeks out of the month. I forget the network and re-sign in t

sample_reviews.title: This printer will not print
sample_reviews.snippet: Just bought this printer it direct do anything

sample_reviews.title: Human help
sample_reviews.snippet: Mike Smith was the best rep ever to assist me. He was patient over the hour time to get my phone and laptop to print. I was very emotional and weak as I am ill and he persevered.

sample_reviews.title: Hate this printer
sample_reviews.snippet: This is a replacement printer and I hate it.  Everything is simply so difficult.  All I do is jump through hoops to do a simple print.  I just printed a photo and I said 4x6 and got a full page.  It i

sample_reviews.title: Ap Bug?
sample_reviews.snippet: I like the app and the details. However I have a message that I haven’t completed my setup.  I go to finish it, I get to the HP+ agreement page, but there’s no way to agree or advance to the agreement

sample_reviews.title: Ink replacement and ease of print is terrible
sample_reviews.snippet: Why can’t you replace the ink, and move on. Why do you have to waste 1/2 the cartridge before it’s starts printing correctly. This product is terrible.

sample_reviews.snippet: Difficult to connect to internet along with it constantly wants to print pages and it wastes Ink! Dislike this a lot as it feels very scammy from HP to get you to buy more ink!

sample_reviews.title: Awesome that you can scan and fax!

sample_reviews.title: Difficult to use.
sample_reviews.snippet: I can use this to log in to my account on my iPad Pro and see my printer, but on my laptop running Win11 I log in and it says I have no printers in my account. There are lengthy directions to troubles

sample_reviews.title: HP is Awful
sample_reviews.snippet: HP are consistently the worst printers I have ever worked with. Their connectivity is spotty at best, their customer support is awful, and their products just don’t work. I am never buying another HP
